column4: Hey I posted a question earlier I am in some serious trouble with GRUB on ubuntu 10.10. Could someone point me in the right direction atleast here...

I installed  Ubuntu 64 bit on an empty partition, windows was already there, after updates ran on ubuntu i rebooted it said "unknown commnd export_symbol" and then dropped me into a grub shell. Now to fix grub what do i do?
Edit your grub config I would think.
Well I have a raid machine does that complicate stuff?
